## Subscriber.subscribe() method

Subscribe to event notifications.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(options?: SubscriberSubscribeOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>SubscriberSubscribeOptions</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

Send an initial SUBSCRIBE request if no subscription as been established. Sends a re-SUBSCRIBE request if the subscription is "active".
